author: Catherine Thorbecke
title: Harvard reverses course, says it won't accept $9 million stimulus funds
description: President Donald Trump said he was "pleased" with Harvard's decision.
content:
After immense pressure from lawmakers, the president and others, Harvard University announced Wednesday it will not be accepting any bailout funds as part of the $2 trillion CARES Act.
Harvard initially made headlines for receiving nearly $9 million in stimu… [+7279 chars]
